statements: SELECT * FROM properties
SELECT property_name, property_type FROM properties WHERE property_price < 10000
SELECT * FROM properties ORDER BY property_name ASC
SELECT property_id, property_price FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment'
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_price > 50000 ORDER BY property_price DESC
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_type, property_price FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'apartment';
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM properties WHERE property_price > 100000 ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'house' AND property_price BETWEEN 50000 AND 200000 ORDER BY property_price ASC;
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM properties WHERE property_price = (SELECT MAX(property_price) FROM properties);
SELECT DISTINCT property_type FROM properties ORDER BY property_type;
SELECT * FROM Properties;
SELECT property_type, property_name, property_price FROM Properties ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM Properties WHERE property_type = 'House';
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM Properties WHERE property_price > 500000;
SELECT MAX(property_price) AS max_property_price FROM Properties;
SELECT * FROM Properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment' ORDER BY property_price DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_price FROM Properties WHERE property_price > 100000 ORDER BY property_price ASC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, property_price FROM Properties WHERE property_price BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY property_id DESC;
SELECT property_name, property_type FROM Properties WHERE property_name LIKE '%Hill%' OR property_type = 'House';
SELECT * FROM Properties JOIN PriceRanges ON Properties.property_price BETWEEN PriceRanges.min_price AND PriceRanges.max_price ORDER BY property_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT name, price FROM properties WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT name, price FROM properties ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT name, price FROM properties WHERE name LIKE '%Villa%';
SELECT name, price FROM properties WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT properties.name, properties.price FROM properties
SELECT properties.name, property_types.property_type FROM properties JOIN property_types ON properties.id = property_types.type_id
SELECT properties.name, property_prices.price FROM properties JOIN property_prices ON properties.id = property_prices.property_id
SELECT * FROM properties WHERE price > 1000
SELECT properties.name, property_prices.price FROM properties JOIN property_prices ON properties.id = property_prices.property_id WHERE property_prices.price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM Properties ORDER BY property_name DESC;
SELECT property_name, price FROM Properties WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT property_name, price FROM Properties WHERE property_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT property_id, property_name, price FROM Properties WHERE property_name LIKE 'Apartment%';
SELECT property_id, price FROM PropertyPrices JOIN Properties ON PropertyPrices.property_id = Properties.property_id WHERE price < 500000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Properties WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY property_name ASC
SELECT property_name, price FROM Properties WHERE price < 5000 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT property_id, price FROM Properties WHERE property_name LIKE '%villa%'
SELECT p.property_name, pt.type_name FROM Properties p JOIN PropertyTypes pt ON p.property_id = pt.type_id
SELECT * FROM PropertyCategories WHERE category_name = 'Apartment'
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT property_name, price FROM properties ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT property_name, price FROM properties WHERE price > 500000;
SELECT property_name, price FROM properties WHERE property_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM property_agents ORDER BY agent_id DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, price FROM properties WHERE price > 5000 ORDER BY property_name ASC
SELECT location_name, property_name, price FROM locations JOIN properties ON locations.property_id = properties.property_id WHERE location_name = 'New York' ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT agent_name, COUNT(property_id) AS num_properties FROM agents JOIN property_agents ON agents.agent_id = property_agents.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name HAVING num_properties > 2 ORDER BY num_properties DESC

SELECT property_name, price, sale_date FROM properties JOIN property_history ON properties.property_id = property_history.property_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY price ASC

SELECT property_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM properties JOIN property_history ON properties.property_id = property_history.property_id GROUP BY property_name HAVING avg_price > 7000 ORDER BY avg_price DESC
